@1@ The class template {{tt|std::nontype_t}} can be used in the constructor's parameter list to match the intended tag.

@2@ The corresponding {{tt|std::nontype}} instance of {{v|1}} is a disambiguation argument tag that can be passed to the constructors of {{c/core|std::function_ref}} to indicate that the contained object should be constructed with the value of the non-type template parameter {{tt|V}}.
